recruit.title: Huu Nhan recruited
recruit.introduce: Huu Nhan technology store is an emotional startup story from a senior student at Can Tho University. With an extremely strong and sudden desire, the student that year had a dream for himself, a dream about technology. That boy has continuously strived to fulfill that dream and today Huu Nhan Technology store was born and has fulfilled his dream and mission.

environment.title: Professional environment
environment.content: Coming to us, you will be trained to become the most professional

social.title: High social benefits
social.content: Huu Nhan is known as a unit with high remuneration for its employees

develop.title: Career advancement
develop.content: Your career will develop and it will be fair that that is your ability

creative.title: Creative freedom
creative.content: We always allow you to contribute your personal opinions and views

introduce.title: Be a part of Huu Nhan
introduce.content: A better environment for you to develop.Coming to us you will come to a professional working environment.More specifically, we continue to write the ambitions and missions ahead and are still unloading
